## WeightedBlendedOIT class

Weighted-blended OIT renderer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class WeightedBlendedOIT extends OIT 
```
**Extends:** [OIT](doc/markdown/./scene.oit.md)

## Remarks

The weighed-blended OIT renderer supports both WebGL, WebGL2 and WebGPU device.
